When rebooting with SU turned off, will cause one extra reboot during bootup it happens in bootlogo screen.\nThis is need to have SU working.
Kernel Support to V1.2 OK.\nYou can reboot with SU turned off.
No Kernel Support to V1.2!!! You can\'t reboot with SU turned off or SU access will be gone.

About iSu
Developer information:
This is a open source app check it on my github\ngithub.com/bhb27/isu
Version:
A simple app to deactivate SU at will and pass safety net verification, today it works only on SU binary of CM base ROM\'s
XDA support forum site
Email

There is no email client installed on the device.
There is no web browser installed on the device.
